2164.subject: CST
2164.course_title_long: Ultra Otter C: ePortfolio Construction I
2164.descrlong: Introduces available ePortfolio platforms and their basic functionality.  Methods for selecting and curating portfolio contents for different purposes (e.g. capstone and job application) are discussed. This workshop is intended for upper division students are expected to have a body of existing work in digital format. Emphasis will be on applied, hands-on experimentation and creation.  (Letter Grade Available)
